12131.content:
*This story takes place just after Carla and Turk left for their honeymoon (the events of which you can read about in the Turk storyline), with one slight difference. In this story, J.D didn't break up at the rehearsal dinner, and instead are enjoying a 'growing' relationship.*

J.D and Elliot were in a cab on the way back to Elliot's place after Turk and Carla's wedding reception. J.D leaned back in the chair, popping the button on his tuxedo trousers.

"Whoof," he sighed, "I think I overdid it at that buffet."

Elliot smiled and snuggled up next to him, patting his small belly, "I think it's kinda cute."

They began to make out, and only stopped when the cab driver cleared his throat and informed them
that they had arrived at their destination.

Throwing a few crumpled bills at the driver, the lovestruck pair stumbled up to Elliot's apartment, a small but well furnished one bedroomed flat, with an ensuite bathroom and full kitchen. 

While Elliot freshened up, J.D stripped out of his suit and lay on the bed in his boxers. He prodded his bloated belly and made a mental note to watch what he ate. Despite what she had said, he doubted Elliot would appreciate if he porked up. 

All thoughts of weight gain were knocked from his mind by the reappearance of Elliot, wearing a lacy black thong... and nothing else.

The next morning, J.D woke up and found...

121311.content:
J.D woke up the next morning to the sound and smell of frying bacon. Despite only being dressed in his black boxer shorts, he made his way out to the kitchen and was surprised to find Elliot standing at the stove, cooking up a packet of bacon.

"Morning J.D." she said perkily. She was fully dressed, and had clearly been up for a while. J.D sat down at the table, which was already loaded with pancakes, sausages and scrambled eggs, as well as some hash browns and a pitcher of orange juice.

"Did you cook all of this?" he asked in disbelief.

"Of course," she replied, sliding the cooked bacon on to a plate, "why do you ask?"

"I don't know, I just never really thought of you as 'domestic'."

"Our maid used to teach me how to cook on Saturday mornings, during my parents' weekly passive-aggressive squash match." Elliot explained as she carried the bacon over to the table, "She taught me so much... Until my mother fired her for 'enabling my trip to tubby town'."

J.D stifled a laugh at his girlfriend's dysfunctional homelife, and instead raised an eyebrow at the sheer amount of food. "Why did you cook so much?"

Elliot shrugged, "I dunno, you don't have to eat it all..."

J.D reached for a plate, but Elliot stopped him.

"Wait!"

She handed him a bright green pill and a small glass of water.

"What's this for?" he asked, confused.

"It's just a vitamin pill." she explained, sitting down, "You're supposed to take it with meals."

J.D shrugged and gulped down the pill. Almost immediately he felt a powerful hunger, and began loading up his plate with big piles of eggs, bacon and potatoes. Elliot smiled and pushed a stack of buttery pancakes towards him.

***

Half an hour later, and J.D sat back, completely stuffed. He had eaten almost everything on the table, as well as the entire jug of OJ, and it showed. His belly bulged out over his pants, rigid with food.

"Oogh," he groaned, before letting out a burp, "I am so full..."

"Mm-hm."

He looked up at Elliot, who was smiling at him over a mug of coffee.

"Hey," he said, looking at her clean plate, "didn't you have any?"

Elliot stood up, fanning a napkin to his greasy lips.

"Nah, I'm not really a big breakfast person."

"But..."

"Shouldn't you go get ready for work?"

"Oh my God!" exclaimed J.D, looking at the clock. Moving as fast as his stuffed belly would let him, he got dressed and left for work, leaving a happy Elliot to clean up the dishes.

Later on...
121311.title: ...Elliot was cooking breakfast.

choices: ...back to his place. He's tired off making a pig of himself in front of Elliot.
1213111.content:
J.D drove to work in his and Turk's 'vintage' car, moaning and burping all the while, trying to make his bloated belly go down.

"Why did I eat so much?" he thought, pulling his car into the parking lot, "Elliot must think I'm a complete pig!"

This last thought set off an elaborate fantasy where Elliot, dressed as a farmer, filled a trough with food for a hugely obese J.D, who when he bent down to eat, had a curly tail poking out from his trousers.

By the time he shook himself back to reality, he had somehow made it to the locker room. Checking to see that no one was around, he changed into a large pair of blue scrubs, and even put on his lab coat, trying to hide his small gut.

J.D soon forgot about his overeating, as he began his normal day of work. Visiting patients, making diagnoses, annoying Dr. Cox, avoiding the Janitor... It was just another routine day at Sacred Heart.

In fact the first time he broke routine was at lunchtime. Normally he would have lunch with Turk, but since he was away, J.D had arranged to meet Elliot.

"Stupid Carla," he grumbled, "Insisting they go on honeymoon 'alone'."

He indulged in a brief fantasy, where Turk and Carla were sitting on the beach, bored without their best friend J.D there.

He walked into the cafeteria to find Elliot already there, sitting next to the window eating a salad. He kissed her on the cheek and told her he was just going to get his food.

"No need." Elliot replied, "I already got you some."

She gestured at the tray opposite her, which was absolutely loaded with food. There were two huge cheeseburgers, sitting in a sea of french fries, onion rings and potato chips, as well as a large bottle of soda.

J.D was staggered by the amount of food, but didn't want to seem rude.

"Uh, thanks." he replied sitting down.

"Well, I know you like cheeseburgers, so..." Elliot shrugged, sensing his confusion.

He stared at his plate, not really sure where to begin. He was still pretty full from breakfast.

"Oh, wait." said Elliot, sliding over a napkin from her side of the table, followed by a bottle of water. Right in the center of the napkin was another little green pill.

"Again?"

"It's like, a two-a-day vitamin?" Elliot explained, "Twice as many vitamins as the one-a-day kind."

J.D knocked back the pill with a swig of water, and almost immediately found his appetite returning. He grabbed a burger and took an impressive bite, followed by another, and another. In no time at all he demolished the burger, before starting on the sides, grabbing an indiscriminate handful and cramming it in his mouth. He was lucky it was a slow time for the cafeteria, so no one was there to witness his gluttonous display, aside from Elliot, who didn't seem to mind.

He tore into the second burger, dripping ketchup right down his top. As he finished off the sides and chugged the soda, Elliot went to get dessert, apple pie with whipped cream. She gave him the larger slice, and quickly declared herself full after one tiny bite of hers, which she then fed to the seemingly insatiable J.D.

In fact it took two slices of the other dessert option (a creamy chocolate cake) before J.D sat back, finally full. His stomach was huge, even bigger than at breakfast, poking out from under his stained top. He groaned as Elliot popped the final crumb of cake in his mouth, before she kissed him on the forehead and told him she had to go.

He sat there for ten minutes, unable to move. He only struggled to his feet when his pager went off, reminding him he was at work.

Later that evening, J.D decides to go...

122.content:
Four years earlier (before Isabella arrived)...

"I do" Turk said to Carla, and with that they were married. Of course their priest was a patient at the Hospital because Turk had failed to show up for the actual wedding ceremony, and they were married in the hospital room. They were finally married and off they went to their all-expense-paid honeymoon in Fiji on the luxurious Turtle Island. They were so happy to be married and excited to have two weeks off at the hospital to just enjoy each others' company and relax.

Carla called out commands to Turk as the packed the car to go the the airport,

"Luggage?"
"Check," Turk replied.
"All three suitcases and the carry-ons?"
"Yes, dear."
"Camera?"
"Check."
"Passports!"
"Check. Carla, honey, this is the third time through the list...we have it all. Just get in the car and lets go!"
"Ok, sweety, I'm just going to grab my purse and then off to Fiji!"

Turk and Carla got their stuff together and made their way to the airport. They checked their bags and made their way to the terminal. They waited at the terminal and then final boarded the plane. The plane was going to be a long 11 and a half hour flight; Turk was not excited about this, but the destination was well worth the flight, and then the flight attendant started her regular in-flight safety speech,

"In the seat pocket in front of you is a pamphlet about the safety features of this plane. Please follow along while I demonstrate in the front. There are 5 exits aboard this plane: 2 at the front, 2 over the wings, and one out the plane's rear end. If you're seated in one of the exit rows, please do not store your bags by your feet..."

Turk tried to listen, but the food choices for the flight caught his attention instead; it was going to be a long flight and he can't remember having eaten anything before leaving...

Fruit & Cheese Plate - Healthy sized wedges of Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, and Brie offered with juicy Grapes, Pecan halves, and dried Apricots. Served with Pepperidge Farm® Crackers. - $6

"Maybe something a little more substantial," he thought.

Thai Chicken Salad - Headlined by a sliced Thai Grilled Chicken Breast, this salad includes a bountiful mix of Mesculun Mixed Greens, Basil, Cilantro, Fresh Mint Leaves, Julienned Red Peppers, Mandarin Oranges, Shredded Carrots, and Peanuts. Served with Ginger Dressing and Breadsticks. Note: chicken, dressing, and breadsticks served individually. - $8

"It is a twelve hour flight...this won't hold me."

Homestyle Steak Burger - A 1/2 pound Angus burger sits on garlic toast with sautéed spinach, roasted tomatoes, onions and tangy Hollandaise sauce. It's served next to sides of homemade fries and coleslaw. - $10

Slightly Famous Steak Sandwich - Tender chuck steak, grilled to your liking, on a Sheboygan hard roll with melted provolone, mushrooms, horseradish mayo, fried onion strings & side of your choice. - $10

Turk's mouth started watering, "There we go," he thought, "Finally something good."

And the flight attendant finished, "Thank you for choosing and enjoy your flight. The flight attendants will be around to offer beverages and meals when we have reached a safe cruising altitude."

"This is going to be so great!" Carla whispered to Turk as she grabbed his arm.
"I know! These meals sound amazing."
"I was talking about the honeymoon."
"Oh, yeah, it is some well deserved r and r."
"The brochure looked stunning I can only imagine it in person."

The plane reached cruising altitude and the flight attendant came around. Carla got a water and a fruit and cheese platter. Turk got a soda and couldn't decide between the burger or the steak sandwich, so he got them both.

"Hey just because were married doesn't mean you can let yourself go...I only married you for your body. " Carla said with a laugh.
"Yeah I know." Turk smiled back.

Their food came and Turk began devouring his burger. He was much hungrier than he thought. Soon his entire plate was licked clean and he moved on the his steak sandwich.

"Holy cow Turk!" Carla exclaimed, who had not even half finished her snacks, "This is a long flight, you can slow down, and anyway we have dinner reservations when we arrive."
"Yeah, it is a long flight. I won't be full by the end. Don't worry."

Turk finished eating his steak meal and his belly was bloated to the max. He loosened his seat belt and went to sleep. He hadn't slept all night because of the early departure. Carla fell asleep to.

The plane ride went pretty fast after they fell asleep and when they woke up there were only three hours left. Turk ordered some snacks and finished the remained of the trip watching the end of the in flight movie. When they landed in Figi it was around 6 at night. The two got their luggage and checked into their villa for their two week honeymoon.

1553321.content:
Kendall woke up refreshed. The band had been on hiatus for almost a month after the release of their hit album and its subsequent tour. The boys had been enjoying their time off by engaging in activities that writing music and being on tour left no time for. Carlos had been playing hockey and had joined an indoor league, Logan was learning how to code, and James? Well, Kendall wasn't exactly sure of what James was doing but whatever it was it kept him very busy. Kendall sat up in his bed and stretched, his black tank top riding up ever so slightly revealing a strip of flesh between his tank top and his boxers. Writing the new album and finishing the accompanying tour had exhausted him, more than he had ever expected. So instead of pining his free time away by doing more work, he'd been relaxing by the pool, getting some sleep, and playing video games. He left his room and walked down the hallway into the ample living room and kitchen of their new house. Now that the boys were older, they had moved into a beach house on Laguna Beach. The house was surprisingly large and boasted an ample upstairs and a rooftop balcony that overlooked the beautiful beach below.

Kendall opened up the fridge and grabbed two slices of the pizza that he had ordered the night before, stacking them on top of each other Saturday Night Fever style and took a bite. He continued munching on the pizza as he got out a bowl for cereal. The microwave clock said it was 9:30 which meant that James would already be out and that Logan and Carlos would be awake soon enough. He finished the pizza and took his bowl of cereal and walked to the couch in the living room positioned in front of the TV and turned it on. He switched it from cable to Netflix and continued watching season three of Grey's Anatomy. He finished the bowl of cereal and was still a bit hungry. He took the bowl back to the kitchen and grabbed the remaining two slices of pizza from the fridge and dumped the empty box into the recycling. He returned to his seat and polished off the pizza, feeling pleasantly full. His belly bowed out slightly and he stifled a burp.

When the episode was over, he used the twenty seconds until the next episode started to grab a drink. He reached for a soda and was surprised by:
1553321.title: Kendall

choices: Letting Carlos go ham, he was already pretty full
Letting Carlos make him a plate, besides, these leftovers looked super good
15533211.content:
Kendall almost dropped his soda, thankfully he hadn't opened the can yet. He heard muffled noises coming from Logan's room that sounded suspiciously like swearing. Kendall popped the tab of the soda opened and headed to Logan's room to investigate. Logan's door was open, revealing the disaster inside. Papers were scattered all over the floor and Logan's bed. A computer system was set up with a few monitors and towers as wells as a partially deconstructed laptop. Logan was sitting on the floor next to an overturned chair. Kendall leaned against the door frame and took a long swig of soda. Logan was shirtless and rubbing his forehead. It might have been his imagination, but Logan's abs seemed to have faded a bit.
"Dude what happened in here?" Kendall inquired, taking in the scene in front of him with a bemused smile.
"I fell asleep in that chair last night, I must have leaned back when I woke up and fallen over," Logan replied with a sigh.
"You gotta be careful man, staying up all night like that isn't good for you."
"I know, but I was on a roll and I kept telling myself one more line, every time I finished a line."
Kendall chuckled and finished his soda. Logan got up and picked up his chair, tucking it under his desk. Logan looked at Kendall with an expression Kendall couldn't quite identify.
"Do I -urp- have something on my face?" Kendall asked.
"Uh no, no I just... uh, well I'm gonna get dressed, I'll be out in a little bit," Logan stammered. Weird. Kendall shrugged and headed back to the living room.

Logan sighed, thankful one of the monitors on his desk separated his boxers from Kendall's line of sight. Logan knew Kendall had put on a few pounds, in fact, if he was being honest, they all had. But his belly stuffed tight after a big breakfast? He had no idea how much it would turn him on. Logan closed the door and headed to his bathroom to change and take a shower, a cold one. Kendall was like his brother. Logan shook off the weird feeling as he shampooed his hair.

Meanwhile, Kendall tossed his soda can into the recycling with the pizza and headed back to the couch as Carlos charged down the stairs into the kitchen. He had work out clothes on and looked panicked.
"Where's the fire buddy?" Kendall laughed as Carlos started to empty the fridge of the leftovers and started laying them out on the counter.
"I have to carb-load today, we are doing some super intense cardio at practice. I totally forgot last night," Carlos responded in rapid fire action. Intrigued, Kendall paused Netflix and sat on a one of the bar stools opposite Carlos. Kendall noticed Carlos's middle looked thicker, and his pants seemed tight around his butt and thighs. But he had been working out with the hockey league and had always been a bit thicker than the other boys. He dismissed it and watched Carlos load up a huge plate with the remnants of meals the boys had cooked and ordered out throughout the week. Carlos looked up, a bit sheepish.
"Sorry dude, did you want me to make you a plate too? Ah man, I didn't mean to steal something you were planning on eating," Carlos said apologetically. Kendall was about to say no, he had already eaten but he paused. He could eat a little more, but he was already pretty full. Kendall debated, and decided on:
15533211.title: A loud thud in Logan's room

choices: Go to his room and nurse his swollen belly
155332112.content:
"Sure I haven't really had breakfast yet," Kendall replied. Carlos smiled and started piling up another plate. He almost seemed relieved. Carlos placed the two overflowing plates into the microwave and started making two more. Kendall was surprised, there was no way he'd be able to eat two plates of a week's worth of leftovers, even if he hadn't already eaten.

"Whoa wait I only agreed to one plate," Kendall protested, although he wasn't sure he even wanted that anymore. Carlos smiled and shook his head.
"Can't carb-load on one plate, dude. Gotta get that protein too," Carlos retorted as he removed the first two plates and loaded the new ones in. Kendall was dubious. Carlos gestured to the couch in the living room and Kendall carried the first two plates in and placed them on the coffee table in front of the couch. He reluctantly sat down in front of one of the monster sized portions. Carlos appeared with the other plates as well as napkins and forks. He plopped down next to Kendall.

"Dig in!"

Kendall unpaused Netflix and the two of them began to chow down. At first, Kendall thought there would be no way he could finish more than half of the first plate. But then he was in the zone. He and Carlos made comments about the show between mouthfuls and before he knew it, he had finished his first plate and was on to the second.His stomach throbbed with a dull ache, but he soldiered on, finishing off the second plate with an unexpected burp. Carlos laughed and clapped him hard on the shoulder, causing his belly to slosh and sending a sharp needle of pain through his gut. He glanced over at Carlos and was amazed at what he saw. Carlos's belly had swollen up, it looked almost inflated. His blue work out shirt was pulled tight against the curve of his stuffed belly. In fact, a tiny sliver of tanned belly poked out where his shirt met his shorts. He drew his hand lazily over the curve of his belly and let out a burp of his own. Kendall was transfixed and thankful for the napkin that concealed his tenting boxers. He had no time to analyze this sudden arousal because Carlos stretched like a cat in the sun, exposing his stuffed middle. His bloated midsection had the remnants of muscle, but no abs and no definition to speak of. It was tan, smooth, and had a kiss of hair whirling around his belly button. A gurgle in his stomach caused Kendall to examine his own middle.

His belly had gone from slightly bowed out to full blown stuffed. His black tank top had ridden up slightly, revealing a pale strip of bloated belly. Kendall knew he had put on some weight since the hiatus but he looked about four months pregnant with all the food crammed into his aching stomach. Kendall attempted to stretch like Carlos had but it sent a jolt of pain through his swollen middle and caused him to let out a quiet whine of pain. It wasn't unpleasant, exactly, but it still hurt to upset his taut and rounded gut.

"-urp- Next time, if you're gonna carb load, you may want to skip the breakfast," Carlos teased, turning slightly so he could prod at Kendall's bloated middle. Kendall swatted his hands away with a moan of discomfort.
"How did you know?" he moaned, rubbing his exposed belly. He couldn't believe it. Even if it was mostly bloat, his belly looked like a proper gut. And the more he rubbed it, the more he saw of Carlos's bloated and thicker midsection, the more intense his arousal became. He began to sorely regret not putting on pants. Carlos chuckled and gently patted Kendall's swollen belly.

"I saw the pizza box, bro. Gotta be careful if you don't want to lose that girlish figure of yours," Carlos prodded. Kendall laughed but the movement hurt his belly and he let out another moan. Carlos grunted and began the laborious process of getting off the couch. Once he was standing Kendall could really see just how much his belly stuck out. He carefully placed one hand over the napkin. He'd have to wait until later to figure out what this all meant. Carlos stretched his hands behind his head, really causing his shirt to ride up this time and let out another burp. He affectionately swatted his belly then turned to face Kendall. His smile faltered for a second as he turned to see a stunned Logan standing in the hallway adjoining Kendall's and Logan's rooms to the kitchen. He was holding a notebook and a stack of papers that he promptly dropped once he laid eyes on Carlos's bloated belly and shirt that perched just above his belly button. Logan desperately began collecting his fallen belongings as Carlos waddled towards the door.

"Well Kendall, I'd skip lunch," Carlos teased, pulling his tightly fitting athletic shirt down to cover his belly, "I gotta go work this off."

Logan stood up and held his notebook and papers surreptitiously over his groin and was trying very hard not to pay attention to Carlos's or Kendall's bloated midsections. Or how Carlos's shirt barely covered his belly. Or how tight it was. Or how Kendall's tank top was hiked up over his pale, bloated gut. Or the sudden tightness in his own pants caused by his two bloated friends sheepishly nursing their guts after overindulging. No, Logan tried very hard not to notice any of that. Kendall let out a quiet burp and Logan rushed back to his room sputtering that he forgot something and Carlos gave Kendall a quick wave as he exited. Kendall struggled to his feet still cradling his belly and waddled back towards his bedroom. He passed Logan's room to see the door was slightly ajar. Logan was acting really weird, but Kendall's belly ached so much from all the food crammed inside of it. He thought for a moment and then decided to:
155332112.title: Letting Carlos make him a plate, besides, these...

1553321121.content:
Kendall ignored Logan's weird ways and dismissed them as he walked towards his room. His belly hurt too much to do anything but lay down, so kendall took a nap in his room. He slept for 6 hours, and the pain and tightness of his gut soon vanished. It returned to normalish size, maybe slightly pudgier, but it no longer caused Kendall any pain. When Kendall awoke, he smelt the aroma of pizza. Hungry after his longer-nap, Kendall quickly got out of bed and walked to the kitchen.

Carlos had just walked in carrying 4 large cheese pizzas. "Hey guys! I got each of us a pizza for dinner!" he called, and Logan followed Kendall downstairs. James was a no-show again, so there were 3 guys and 4 pizzas. Carlos set a pizza in front of each seaf and he began on his own box. Kendall and Logan joined him and began eating the 8 large slices of pizza.

The boys ate their pizza hungrily. Kendall found that it tasted amazing, and when he had finished his pizza box with ease, he still wanted to eat more. Kendall slowly brought James' box fo his seat, craving more of the pizza. Besides, James wasnt coming downstairs, he never did anymore. And Kendall didn't want to waste any food....

Logan and Carlos were so concentrated on their own dinner that they didb't notice Kendall grab James' box. The three enjoyed their dinner and Kendall's shirt began to expose his hairy belly. Kendall unbuttoned his jeans and felt a sigh of relief and continued eating.

"That was nice." Logan said
"Agreed." Kendall replied.
"I dont know about you guys, but I'm still hungry." Carlos said, patting his belly.
"I guess I could eat more..." Logan said. Kendall, having eating double of what the others had, was feeling pretty full. He didnt want the same pain as earlier, but he didnt want to admit that he had eaten James' dinner. "Sure!" Kendall said aloud.

A few minutes later, Carlos re-entered the kitchen with 2 medium sized cakes. "Here's dessert!" he said. He placed the 2 cakes on the table and cut each into 8 pieces. "Each of us can have four, and we can save 4 for James!" Carlos said. "Speaking of James, where's his piz-"
"Let's dig in!" Kendall said and took out a piece from the cake to eat. Four pieces isn't bad, he thought. But once he swallowed the first bite, Kendall fell in love with the taste. The chocolate cake tasted like heaven, and he knew he could finish the other four pieces.

Kendall chomped away, gladly chewing and swallowing each bit of his cake, until there was none left. Kendall was in an eating bliss and he accidentally ate James' portion. Kendalls belly now stook out of his shirt with no covering, and everything under his naval was revealed. He tried to button back his jeans witg no luck, so he sat in the chair rubbing his belly, hiding the James' missing food in his pizza box. He threw his away, but not unnoticed.

"What do you have there?" Carlos asked Kendall. "What?! Nothing." Kendall quickly replied, embarassed of eating double his meal. Carlos got up, and turned Kendall around and slapped Kendall's gut. "Good dinner?" Carlos laughed.
"Looks like you had one too!" Kendall joked and patted Carlos' gut that also poked out of his shirt. Logan stood up and he seemed to follow the trend. Although Kendall's gut was noticeably bigger, the three laughed. Kendall's stomach pain from earlier had returned, so he re-entered his room for the night.

In the middle of the night, noises awake Kendall from his sleep. Worried of a robber, he grabs a bat in his room and slowly walked downstairs to the kitchen. In there, he found....
